name: SS-GREETING
positive_description: This was easy! You've welcomed the client!
negative_description: You should always begin a conversation with a greeting.

name: AS-QUICKTIP
positive_description: You've explained correctly how the lucky numbers might be entered.
negative_description: Explain how the lucky numbers might be entered.

name: AS-ROWS
positive_description: Very well! You've captured the number of rows.
negative_description: You should capture how many rows the customer wants to play.

name: AS-DRAW
positive_description: You've asked which drawing should be choosen.
negative_description: Ask which drawing should be choosen.

name: AS-ADD_ON
positive_description: Very good! You've mentioned the add-on game.
negative_description: Don't forget to ask about an add-on game.

name: SS-PRICE
positive_description: You've fared well the customer nicely.
negative_description: Be polite and fare well the customer nicely!
